Function reference

All functions

check_mae_isoformic_is_list()
Check if Isoformic mae have a list isoformic slot
check_mae_isoformic_tx_to_gene()
Check if Isoformic mae have a tx_to_gene
check_se_metadata_level_length()
Check if content of metadata level slot is a string.
check_se_metadata_level_type()
Check if content of metadata level slot is a string.
create_isoformic_mae_from_se()
Create Isoformic Object from SummarizedExperiment
download_reference()
Download Reference Files From GENCODE
is_deg_sig()
Add Differential Gene Expression Results to Transcript Table
join_DEG_DET()
Merge Gene and Transcript Level Differential Expression Tables
make_tx_to_gene()
Create Transcript to Gene Relationship Table
modify_lnc_ranges()
Edit the lncRNA start and end table Table of lncRNA starts and ends plus a value to add
plot_log2FC()
Plot Log2 Fold-Change Results
plot_tx_context()
Plot Transcript Genomic Context
plot_tx_expr()
Plot Transcript per gene expression
prepare_annotation()
Prepare Annotation
prepare_exon_annotation()
Prepare Exon based Position Annotation Table
prepare_profile_data()
Prepare Data for Profile Plot
run_enrichment()
Run Functional Analysis
run_swish_pairwise()
Run Swish Differential Expression
se_experiment_level()
Return SummarizedExperiment Experiment Level
validate_isoformic_mae()
Validate Isoformic Object
